2) AizstƒÅj CEFR helperu JS

Atrodi skripta daƒºu, kur sƒÅkas komentƒÅrs // ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî CEFR helperi ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî un nomaini visu ≈°o bloku uz:

html
<script>
  // ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî CEFR helperi ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
  const CEFR_LEVELS = ["A1","A2","B1","B2","C1","C2"];

  function getCEFR() {
    return sessionStorage.getItem('cefrLevel') || '';
  }
  function setCEFR(val) {
    sessionStorage.setItem('cefrLevel', val || '');
    renderCEFRIndicator();
  }
  function renderCEFRIndicator() {
    const span = document.getElementById('cefrActive');
    if (!span) return;
    const c = getCEFR();
    span.textContent = c ? `Aktƒ´vs: ${c}` : '';
  }
  function renderCEFRChips() {
    const box = document.getElementById('cefrChips');
    if (!box) return;
    box.innerHTML = '';
    const active = getCEFR();
    CEFR_LEVELS.forEach(lv => {
      const btn = document.createElement('button');
      btn.type = 'button';
      btn.className =
        'px-3 py-1.5 rounded-full border text-sm ' +
        (active === lv
          ? 'bg-slate-900 text-white border-slate-900'
          : 'bg-white text-slate-700 border-slate-300 hover:bg-slate-100');
      btn.textContent = lv;
      btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        setCEFR(lv === active ? '' : lv);  // otrreiz nospie≈æot ‚Äì no≈Üem izvƒìli
        renderCEFRChips();
      });
      box.appendChild(btn);
    });
  }

  // inicializƒÅcija
  renderCEFRChips();
  renderCEFRIndicator();

  // ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî ‚Äúuzlƒ´mƒìjam‚Äù CEFR klƒÅt eso≈°ajam URL veidotƒÅjam ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
  (function attachCEFR() {
    const orig = window.buildPerplexityURL; // tavƒÅ lapƒÅ jau pastƒÅv
    window.buildPerplexityURL = function(instruction, userQ) {
      const cefr = getCEFR();
      let instr = instruction || '';
      if (cefr) {
        instr += `\n\nRespond at CEFR level ${cefr}. Use vocabulary and grammar appropriate to this level.`;
      }
      if (typeof orig === 'function') {
        return orig(instr, userQ);
      }
      const base = (window.PPLX_BASE || 'https://www.perplexity.ai/search?q=');
      const trimmed = (userQ || '').trim();
      const payload = instr + (trimmed ? '\n\n' + trimmed : '');
      return base + encodeURIComponent(payload);
    };
  })();
</script>

  <script>
    (function(){
      // ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî CEFR ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
      const CEFR = ["A1","A2","B1","B2","C1","C2"];
      const state = {
        language: sessionStorage.getItem('answerLang') || 'Latvie≈°u',
        level: sessionStorage.getItem('cefrLevel') || 'B1'
      };

      const $chips = document.getElementById('cefrChips');
      const $active = document.getElementById('cefrActive');
      const $lang   = document.getElementById('answerLang');
      const $msg    = document.getElementById('userMsg');
      const $sys    = document.getElementById('sysPreview');

      function save(){
        sessionStorage.setItem('answerLang', state.language || '');
        sessionStorage.setItem('cefrLevel', state.level || '');
      }

      function renderChips(){
        $chips.innerHTML = '';
        CEFR.forEach(code=>{
          const b = document.createElement('button');
          b.type = 'button';
          b.className = 'chip' + (state.level === code ? ' active' : '');
          b.textContent = code;
          b.setAttribute('aria-pressed', state.level === code ? 'true':'false');
          b.addEventListener('click', ()=>{
            state.level = code;
            save();
            renderChips();
            renderStatus();
            updateSys();
            fireChange();
          });
          $chips.appendChild(b);
        });
      }

      function renderStatus(){
        $active.textContent = state.level || '‚Äî';
      }

      function getInstruction(){
        const lang = (state.language || '').trim() || 'Latvie≈°u';
        const level = state.level || 'B1';
        const guide = {
          A1:["ƒªoti vienkƒÅr≈°as frƒÅzes","ƒ™si teikumi","PamatsvƒÅrdi"],
          A2:["VienkƒÅr≈°i teikumi","Bie≈æƒÅkie darbƒ´bas vƒÅrdi","Lƒìna, skaidra strukt≈´ra"],
          B1:["Skaidra, vienkƒÅr≈°ota valoda","Pamattermini ar ƒ´siem skaidrojumiem"],
          B2:["Precƒ´za, draudzƒ´ga valoda","Termini ar ƒ´su definƒ´ciju","SakƒÅrtota argumentƒÅcija"],
          C1:["Akadƒìmiski korekta valoda","Termini bez pƒÅrmƒìrƒ´gas vienkƒÅr≈°o≈°anas"],
          C2:["Dabiska profesionƒÅla valoda","Pilna terminoloƒ£ija","Niansƒìta argumentƒÅcija"]
        }[level] || [];
        const bullets = guide.map(s=>`- ${s}`).join('\n');
        return (
`Always respond in ${lang}.
Maintain CEFR level ${level} (vocabulary, syntax, density). Switch immediately if the user changes the level mid-conversation.
Style guide for ${level}:
${bullets}`
        );
      }

      function updateSys(){
        const sys = getInstruction();
        const msg = ($msg.value || '').trim();
        $sys.value = `# System Instruction\n${sys}\n\n` + (msg ? `# User Message\n${msg}` : '');
      }

      // ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî Perplexity URL (var aizvietot ar savu) ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
      function buildPerplexityURL(instruction, userQ){
        const base = 'https://www.perplexity.ai/search?q=';
        const payload = (instruction || '') + '\n\n' + (userQ || '');
        return base + encodeURIComponent(payload);
      }

      // ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî publiska neliela API ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
      const AlexLingua = {
        _subs: [],
        getState: () => ({ language: state.language, level: state.level }),
        getCefrInstruction: () => getInstruction(),
        onChange: (cb) => { if (typeof cb === 'function') AlexLingua._subs.push(cb); }
      };
      window.AlexLingua = AlexLingua;

      function fireChange(){
        const detail = { ...AlexLingua.getState(), instruction: getInstruction() };
        window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('cefr-change', { detail }));
        AlexLingua._subs.forEach(fn=>{ try{ fn(detail); }catch(e){} });
      }

      // ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî UI notikumi ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
      $lang.value = state.language;
      $lang.addEventListener('change', ()=>{
        state.language = $lang.value || state.language;
        save(); updateSys(); fireChange();
      });
      $msg.addEventListener('input', updateSys);

      document.getElementById('openPerplexity').addEventListener('click', ()=>{
        const url = buildPerplexityURL(getInstruction(), $msg.value || '');
        window.open(url, '_blank');
      });
      document.getElementById('copyPrompt').addEventListener('click', async ()=>{
        try{
          await navigator.clipboard.writeText($sys.value);
          toast('NorƒÅdƒ´jums iekopƒìts.');
        }catch(e){ alert('NeizdevƒÅs iekopƒìt: '+e); }
      });

      function toast(text){
        const t = document.createElement('div');
        t.textContent = text;
        Object.assign(t.style,{
          position:'fixed',inset:'auto auto 24px 24px',background:'#14243a',color:'#fff',
          padding:'10px 12px',border:'1px solid #2a3a52',borderRadius:'10px',
          boxShadow:'0 6px 22px rgba(0,0,0,.35)',zIndex:9999,opacity:0,transition:'opacity .2s'
        });
        document.body.appendChild(t);
        requestAnimationFrame(()=>t.style.opacity=1);
        setTimeout(()=>{ t.style.opacity=0; setTimeout(()=>t.remove(),200); },1500);
      }

      // init
      renderChips(); renderStatus(); updateSys(); fireChange();
    })();
  </script>
</body>
</html>

<script>
  const CSV_URL = 'languages.csv?v=20251110b';
  const PPLX_BASE = 'https://www.perplexity.ai/search?q=';

  const grid = document.querySelector('.grid');
  const qEl = document.getElementById('userQuestion');
  const sameTabEl = document.getElementById('openSameTab');
  document.getElementById('clearBtn').addEventListener('click', () => { qEl.value = ''; qEl.focus(); });

  // VienkƒÅr≈°s CSV parseris + BOM no≈Üem≈°ana
  function parseCSV(text) {
    // no≈Üem BOM, ja tƒÅds ir
    if (text.charCodeAt(0) === 0xFEFF) text = text.slice(1);

    const rows = [];
    let cur = '', row = [], quoted = false;
    for (let i = 0; i < text.length; i++) {
      const c = text[i];
      if (c === '"') {
        if (quoted && text[i + 1] === '"') { cur += '"'; i++; }
        else quoted = !quoted;
      } else if (!quoted && (c === ',' || c === '\n' || c === '\r')) {
        row.push(cur); cur = '';
        if (c === '\n' || c === '\r') { if (row.length) rows.push(row); row = []; }
      } else {
        cur += c;
      }
    }
    if (cur.length || row.length) { row.push(cur); rows.push(row); }

    if (!rows.length) return [];
    const header = rows[0].map(h => h.trim().toLowerCase());
    const idx = {
      id: header.indexOf('id'),
      title: header.indexOf('title'),
      subtitle: header.indexOf('subtitle'),
      instruction: header.indexOf('instruction'),
    };
    const out = [];
    for (let i = 1; i < rows.length; i++) {
      const r = rows[i];
      if (!r.length) continue;
      out.push({
        id: r[idx.id] || String(i),
        title: r[idx.title] || '',
        subtitle: r[idx.subtitle] || '',
        instruction: r[idx.instruction] || '',
      });
    }
    return out;
  }

  function cardHTML(card) {
    return `
      <article class="rounded-xl border border-slate-200 bg-white p-3 shadow-sm hover:shadow">
        <div class="flex items-start justify-between gap-3">
          <div>
            <h3 class="font-semibold">${escapeHtml(card.title || '')}</h3>
            <p class="text-xs text-slate-500">${escapeHtml(card.subtitle || '')}</p>
          </div>
          <div class="text-[10px] text-slate-400">${escapeHtml(card.id || '')}</div>
        </div>
        <div class="mt-2">
          <pre class="whitespace-pre-wrap text-xs text-slate-700 bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 rounded p-2">${escapeHtml(card.instruction || '')}</pre>
        </div>
        <div class="mt-3 flex items-center gap-2">
          <a class="px-3 py-1.5 rounded-lg border border-slate-300 text-sm hover:bg-slate-50"
             href="${buildPerplexityURL(card.instruction || '', qEl.value || '')}"
             target="${sameTabEl.checked ? '_self' : '_blank'}">
            Start
          </a>
          <button class="px-3 py-1.5 rounded-lg border border-slate-300 text-sm hover:bg-slate-50"
                  onclick="navigator.clipboard.writeText('${escapeAttr(card.instruction || '')}')">
            Copy
          </button>
        </div>
      </article>`;
  }

  function escapeHtml(s){
    return (s || '').replace(/[&<>]/g, m => ({'&':'&amp;','<':'&lt;','>':'&gt;'}[m]));
  }
  function escapeAttr(s){
    return (s || '').replace(/["'`\\]/g, m => ({'"':'&quot;', "'":'&#39;', '`':'&#96;','\\':'\\\\'}[m]).toString());
  }

  function renderCards(cards) {
    grid.innerHTML = cards.map(cardHTML).join('');
  }

  async function loadCards() {
    try {
      // vispirms mƒìƒ£inƒÅm ielƒÅdƒìt ƒÅrƒìjo CSV (parasti tas pats katalogs)
      const resp = await fetch(CSV_URL, { cache: 'no-cache' });
      if (!resp.ok) throw new Error('HTTP ' + resp.status);
      const txt = await resp.text();
      const cards = parseCSV(txt);
      if (cards.length) return cards;
      throw new Error('Parsed 0 cards from external CSV');
    } catch (e) {
      console.warn('Using inline CSV fallback:', e.message || e);
      const inline = document.getElementById('languages-csv');
      const txt = (inline && inline.textContent) ? inline.textContent : '';
      return parseCSV(txt);
    }
  }

  loadCards().then(cards => {
    window.__CARDS__ = cards;
    if (!cards.length) {
      grid.innerHTML = `
        <div class="text-sm text-red-700">
          Kartƒ´tes neizdevƒÅs ielƒÅdƒìt. PƒÅrbaudi:
          <ul class="list-disc ml-5 mt-2">
            <li><code>languages.csv</code> ceƒºu (tam jƒÅb≈´t tajƒÅ pa≈°ƒÅ mapƒì)</li>
            <li>CSV galvenes: <code>id,title,subtitle,instruction</code></li>
            <li>BOM (saglabƒÅ kƒÅ UTF-8 bez BOM)</li>
          </ul>
          <div class="mt-2"><a class="underline" href="languages.csv" target="_blank">Atvƒìrt languages.csv</a></div>
        </div>`;
      return;
    }
    renderCards(cards);
  }).catch(err => {
    console.error(err);
    grid.innerHTML = '<div class="text-sm text-red-700">NeizdevƒÅs ielƒÅdƒìt languages.csv</div>';
  });
</script>

<script>
  // ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî CEFR helperi ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
  const CEFR_LEVELS = ["A1","A2","B1","B2","C1","C2"];

  function getCEFR() {
    return sessionStorage.getItem('cefrLevel') || '';
  }
  function setCEFR(val) {
    sessionStorage.setItem('cefrLevel', val || '');
    renderCEFRIndicator();
  }
  function renderCEFRIndicator() {
    const span = document.getElementById('cefrActive');
    if (!span) return;
    const c = getCEFR();
    span.textContent = c ? `Aktƒ´vs: ${c}` : '';
  }
  function renderCEFRChips() {
    const box = document.getElementById('cefrChips');
    if (!box) return;
    box.innerHTML = '';
    const active = getCEFR();
    CEFR_LEVELS.forEach(lv => {
      const btn = document.createElement('button');
      btn.type = 'button';
      btn.className =
        'px-3 py-1.5 rounded-full border text-sm ' +
        (active === lv
          ? 'bg-slate-900 text-white border-slate-900'
          : 'bg-white text-slate-700 border-slate-300 hover:bg-slate-100');
      btn.textContent = lv;
      btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const cur = getCEFR();
        setCEFR(cur === lv ? '' : lv);  // atkƒÅrtoti nospie≈æot ‚Äì no≈Üem izvƒìli
        renderCEFRChips();
      });
      box.appendChild(btn);
    });
  }

  // inicializƒÅcija
  renderCEFRChips();
  renderCEFRIndicator();

  // ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî ‚Äúuzlƒ´mƒìjam‚Äù CEFR klƒÅt eso≈°ajam URL veidotƒÅjam ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
  (function attachCEFR() {
    const orig = window.buildPerplexityURL; // ja tev jau ir ≈°ƒ´ funkcija
    window.buildPerplexityURL = function(instruction, userQ) {
      const cefr = getCEFR();
      let instr = instruction || '';
      if (cefr) {
        instr += `\n\nRespond at CEFR level ${cefr}. Use vocabulary and grammar appropriate to this level.`;
      }
      if (typeof orig === 'function') {
        return orig(instr, userQ);
      }
      // Ja kƒÅdreiz mainƒ´sies iek≈°ƒìjie nosaukumi, dro≈°ƒ´bas nets:
      const base = (window.PPLX_BASE || 'https://www.perplexity.ai/search?q=');
      const trimmed = (userQ || '').trim();
      const payload = instr + (trimmed ? '\n\n' + trimmed : '');
      return base + encodeURIComponent(payload);
    };
  })();
</script>

JƒÅ, var padarƒ´t CEFR stingrƒÅku. Tagad tev instrukcija ir pƒÅrƒÅk ‚Äúmaiga‚Äù, tƒÅpƒìc modelis slƒ´d uz augstƒÅku lƒ´meni. ZemƒÅk iedodu konkrƒìtu nomai≈Üu funkcijai getInstruction(), kas katram lƒ´menim uzliek skaidrus ierobe≈æojumus (teikumu garums, gramatika, leksika, formatƒìjums) un pieprasa pa≈°pƒÅrbaudi un pƒÅrrakstƒ´≈°anu, ja nosacƒ´jumi nav izpildƒ´ti.

Ieliec ≈°o tavƒÅ lapƒÅ (Axel/axel_lingua), vienkƒÅr≈°i aizstƒÅj eso≈°o getInstruction() funkciju ar ≈°o versiju. Nekas cits nav jƒÅpƒÅrb≈´vƒì.

<script>
  // StingrƒÅka CEFR instrukcija ar pa≈°pƒÅrbaudi
  function getInstruction(){
    const lang  = (sessionStorage.getItem('answerLang') || 'Latvie≈°u').trim();
    const level = sessionStorage.getItem('cefrLevel') || 'B1';

    // Strikti profili katram lƒ´menim
    const profiles = {
      A1: {
        desc: "ƒªOTI VIENKƒÄR≈†S, iesƒÅcƒìja lƒ´menis",
        rules: [
          "Maks. 8‚Äì10 vƒÅrdi teikumƒÅ.",
          "Lieto tikai pamatlaiku (tagadni). Neizmanto pagƒÅtni vai nƒÅkotni, ja vien absol≈´ti nepiecie≈°ams.",
          "Nav pasƒ´vƒÅs kƒÅrtas. Nav sare≈æƒ£ƒ´tu teikumu un pakƒÅrtoto teikumu.",
          "Nelieto idiomus, metaforas, sarunvalodas ≈æargonu.",
          "Leksika: ƒºoti bie≈æi lietoti vƒÅrdi; izvairies no tehniskajiem terminiem.",
          "Formatƒìjums: 3‚Äì5 ƒ´si teikumi vai punktu saraksts."
        ]
      },
      A2: {
        desc: "VienkƒÅr≈°s, pamata sazi≈Üa",
        rules: [
          "Maks. 12 vƒÅrdi teikumƒÅ.",
          "VienkƒÅr≈°ie laiki (tagadne, vienkƒÅr≈°a pagƒÅtne), bez sare≈æƒ£ƒ´tas sintakses.",
          "Izvairies no pasƒ´vƒÅs kƒÅrtas un sare≈æƒ£ƒ´tƒÅm saliktƒÅm konstrukcijƒÅm.",
          "VƒÅrdnƒ´ca: bie≈æƒÅkie vƒÅrdi, skaidri piemƒìri.",
          "Formatƒìjums: ƒ´si teikumi + 1‚Äì2 vienkƒÅr≈°i piemƒìri."
        ]
      },
      B1: {
        desc: "Skaidra, vienkƒÅr≈°ota valoda",
        rules: [
          "Maks. 15‚Äì18 vƒÅrdi teikumƒÅ; ƒ´si paragrƒÅfi.",
          "Izvairies no smagnƒìjƒÅm definƒ´cijƒÅm; termini ar ƒ´su paskaidrojumu iekavƒÅs.",
          "Piemƒìri no ikdienas."
        ]
      },
      B2: {
        desc: "Precƒ´za, bet lietotƒÅjam draudzƒ´ga",
        rules: [
          "Maks. 20‚Äì22 vƒÅrdi teikumƒÅ.",
          "Strukturƒìta argumentƒÅcija (ƒ´si teikumi, skaidras saites).",
          "Termini ar ƒ´su definƒ´ciju pirmoreiz minot."
        ]
      },
      C1: {
        desc: "Akadƒìmiski korekta valoda",
        rules: [
          "Mƒìrens teikumu garums; izvairies no liekvƒÅrdƒ´bas.",
          "Terminoloƒ£ija bez pƒÅrmƒìrƒ´gas vienkƒÅr≈°o≈°anas.",
          "Konspektƒ´vi piemƒìri/atsauces, ja der."
        ]
      },
      C2: {
        desc: "Dabiska profesionƒÅla valoda",
        rules: [
          "Brƒ´va, niansƒìta valoda ar pilnu terminoloƒ£iju.",
          "ArgumentƒÅcija precƒ´za, bez liekvƒÅrdƒ´bas.",
          "Piemƒìri ƒ´si, tikai ja palƒ´dz skaidrƒ´bai."
        ]
      }
    };

    const p = profiles[level] || profiles.B1;

    // Pa≈°pƒÅrbaudes mehƒÅnisms, lai modelis pats ‚ÄûpƒÅrraksta‚Äù, ja nesanƒÅk
    const selfCheck = [
      "Pƒìc atbildes uzrakstƒ´≈°anas veic ƒ´su, KLUSU pa≈°pƒÅrbaudi:",
      "- Vai teikumu garums atbilst ierobe≈æojumiem ≈°im lƒ´menim?",
      "- Vai nav pasƒ´vƒÅs kƒÅrtas (A1‚ÄìA2) vai sare≈æƒ£ƒ´tu pakƒÅrtoto teikumu (A1‚ÄìB1)?",
      "- Vai leksika nav par gr≈´tu ≈°im lƒ´menim?",
      "Ja kƒÅds nosacƒ´jums nav izpildƒ´ts, ƒ´si PƒÄRRASKSTI atbildi tƒÅ, lai visi nosacƒ´jumi b≈´tu izpildƒ´ti (maks. 2 pƒÅrrakstƒ´≈°anas).",
      "NerƒÅdi ≈°o pa≈°pƒÅrbaudi lietotƒÅjam."
    ].join("\n");

    // GalvenƒÅ instrukcija
    const header = `Always respond in ${lang}. Keep strict CEFR level ${level}.`;
    const rules  = p.rules.map(r => `- ${r}`).join("\n");

    return [
      header,
      `CEFR ${level} profile: ${p.desc}`,
      "Rules:",
